name: Speed Plumber
description:
Made for weekly gamejam 104

A score attack game where you build pipes upwards carrying water while the screen scrolls upwards

To get a high score you must keep up with the screen and place as many connecting pipes as possible (only get points if it leads back to water source)

Instructions:

mouse over tile and press the numbers 1-5 to place corresponding pipes
complete the plumbing upwards and don't let the bottom of the screen catch up to you
placing over existing pipes will break them if they don't carry water

Can press enter for quick restart
